typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		OrderID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		OrderDate as string,
		ShipDate as string,
		TotalCost as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> C4OrdersSource
source(output(
		OrderDetailID as string,
		OrderID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		Quantity as string,
		UnitCost as string,
		LineNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> C4OrderDetails
C4OrdersSource, C4OrderDetails join(ChangeColumns@OrderID == C4OrderDetails@OrderID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> C4OrderJoin
C4OrderDetails select(mapColumn(
		OrderDetailID,
		OrderID,
		MovieID,
		Quantity,
		UnitCost,
		LineNumber,
		OrdDtlCreatedDate = CreatedDate,
		OrdDtlUpdatedDate = UpdatedDate
	)) ~> Select1
